body_html: I'm without a computer at the moment, spilling coffee on it is bad for its health. I'll be back up tomorrow and merge master into this branch. I was thinking of adding a few more tests, mostly around things that I am not 100% confident about. There is no rush for this one IMO, it's rather a conversation that will eventually get merged.
